thread.title: Should drink drivers lose the right to a work licence?
thread.title_full: Should drink drivers lose the right to a work licence?

title: Should drink drivers lose the right to a work licence?
text:
Image: 
Julian Smith: AAP MP Mark Bailey wants you to consider removing the work licence option for people caught drink driving Share Download (2.72 MB) MP3 available 2.72 MB 
Queensland is one of the only jurisdictions in the country where you can get caught drink driving, lose your licence, and then apply for a work licence. 
Given that drink driving is responsible for one in five of the deaths on our roads, and one out of every four people caught drink driving are repeat offenders, does that need to change? 
Minister for Road Safety, Mark Bailey, joined the program. Duration: 5min 56sec Broadcast: Thu 9 Feb 2017, 6:00am Published: Thu 9 Feb 2017, 10:11am
